title: Law modifying and complementing Law relating to the Organisation and Functioning of the National Electoral Commission as Modified and Complemented to Date
title_en: Law modifying and complementing Law relating to the Organisation and Functioning of the National Electoral Commission as Modified and Complemented to Date

provisions.title: Article 282 - Commencement
provisions.content: This Law shall come into force on the date of its publication in the Official Gazette of the Republic of Rwanda. Kigali, on 24/05/2013 (sé) KAGAME Paul President of the Republic (sé) Dr HABUMUREMYI Pierre Damien Prime Minister Seen and sealed with the Seal of the Republic (sé) BUSINGYE Johnston Minister of Justice /Attorney General
